results.name: Triangle of coefficients of generating function of binary rooted trees of height at most n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..12, flattened
E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, On Cayley's Enumeration of Alkanes (or 4-Valent Trees), J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 2 (1999), Article 99.1.1.
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
maple: b:= proc(n, h) option remember; `if`(n<2, n, `if`(h<1, 0, `if`(n::odd, 0,
seq(seq(A(n, k), k=0..2^n-1), n=0..6);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 08 2017
mathematica: Table[Table[A[n, k], {k, 0, 2^n-1}], {n, 0, 6}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 14 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
